body: A soul forger casts one fewer spell of each level than normal. If this reduces the number to 0, he may cast spells of that level only if his Intelligence allows bonus spells of that level.
name: Diminished Spellcasting
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Magus/Magus Archetypes/Soul Forger/Diminished Spellcasting
